text: int sum ( int ) ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int main ( ) { int s = 0 , n , i , j , c ; printf ( "Enter the no of cases :" ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & c ) ; while ( c != 0 ) { printf ( "enter the no. of lines :" ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; printf ( "Enter the values now : " ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( j > i ) a [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; else if ( i > n - 1 ) a [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; else scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } s = sum ( n - 1 ) ; printf ( "The sum is %d\n" , s ) ; c -- ; } } int sum ( int n ) { int i , j ; for ( i = n - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = n - 1 ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { if ( ( a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) >= ( a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ) ) a [ i ] [ j ] = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; else a [ i ] [ j ] = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; } } return a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; }
